translations: v.乘船游览；以平稳的速度行驶；缓慢巡行，兜风；轻而易举赢得，轻取；<非正式>猎艳

phrs.translation: 汤姆·克鲁斯（美国著名影星）

sentences.sentence: He was billed as the new Tom Cruise.
sentences.translation: 他被宣传为新汤姆•克鲁斯。

sentences.sentence: They were rescued by a passing cruise ship.
sentences.translation: 他们被一艘经过的游轮救起。

sentences.sentence: I've always wanted to go on a cruise.
